FILE: cm450740v11.0.txt
DYAD: LIBERIA - JAPAN
RIVALRY: RIV1074
DISPUTE(S): MID3526 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180707
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180915

WWII MIDs: MID3526

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
Liberia declared war against Japan on January 27, 1944. Japan and Liberia signed a peace treaty in San Francisco on September 8, 1951.

SOURCES-CM:
